CustomField.description: BODEV-1691: Region of CSM Owner's Work Location.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( CSM_Owner__c ), "", CASE( TEXT( CSM_Owner__r.Work_Location__c ), "Boston", "US", "San Carlos", "US", "Amsterdam", "EMEA", "London", "EMEA", "Dubai", "EMEA", "Melbourne", "APAC", "" ) )
CustomField.label: CSM Owner Office Grouped
